title: Global wildlife populations down by nearly 70% since 1970
description: Worldwide Fund says Latin America suffered biggest decline and blames human activity. Also: 39 people have now died in an outbreak of Ebola which began in Uganda last month; and the football from Maradona's famous Hand of God goal is to be auctioned.
itunes:subtitle: Worldwide Fund for Nature says Latin America suffered biggest decline
itunes:summary: Worldwide Fund says Latin America suffered biggest decline and blames human activity. Also: 39 people have now died in an outbreak of Ebola which began in Uganda last month; and the football from Maradona's famous Hand of God goal is to be auctioned.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
